com.bulletphysics.linearmath
Class GeometryUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.bulletphysics.linearmath.GeometryUtil

public class GeometryUtil
extends Object

GeometryUtil helper class provides a few methods to convert between plane equations and vertices.
